message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the exclusive opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a price of $1,400,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and compromise on the price.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1,200,000 is significantly below its true value. I could consider $1,350,000.  This is a very fair offer considering the potential this product holds for your business.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $1,300,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $1,300,000?
